title: Center for Neuroscience Fund
description: To provide support for capital construction projects, groundbreaking interdisciplinary research, training of young Neuroscientists, and other needs towards the advancement of Neuroscience at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide support for capital construction projects, groundbreaking interdisciplinary research, training of young Neuroscientists, and other needs towards the advancement of Neuroscience at the University of Colorado Boulder.
